Logging
=======

Logging in LibSPN.

**NOTE** Due to a bug in Sphinx (https://github.com/sphinx-doc/sphinx/issues/1393), the docstring for the variables below is wrong!

.. autofunction:: libspn.config_logger
.. autofunction:: libspn.get_logger
.. autodata:: libspn.WARNING
.. autodata:: libspn.INFO
.. autodata:: libspn.DEBUG1
.. autodata:: libspn.DEBUG2
